author: robocopsgonemad
content:
Next actions from the last meeting:

- determine how widly the problem of Null vs. Not Found is across the spec.
- make totalDifficulty optional, so that it can remain for pre-merge blocks, but may be omitted in post-merge blocks.

@here we could also use attendence from anyone with committer permissions on https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pulls
